betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Using Curios to Accelerate Research

Utilizing curios can significantly speed up your research process, with different curios enhancing specific research specialties:

Arcane Curio: Boosts Thaumaturgy. Obtainable by mining Sinister Crystals.
Basics Curio: Enhances Alchemy. Found by mining Amber Ore.
Warped Curio: Focuses on Infusion. Dropped by killing Corrupted Creatures.
Ancient Curio: Specializes in Golemancy. Occasionally spawns on loot pedestals in Eldritch Spires.
Luminous Curio: Improves Arcane Infusion. Acquired through trades with Stoneborn.
Occult Curio: Advances Occultism but adds Warp. Dropped by defeating Occult Guardians.
Pech Wand: Neutral, no specialization. Available through trades with Pech Mages.
Bloody Codex: Advances Occultism but adds Warp. Obtained from defeating Blood Cultists.
Additionally, using enchanted tools or weapons with the §6Curious§r enchantment grants a chance to acquire random curios when mining blocks or defeating mobs.
